https://raw.githubusercontent.com/shivam21nit-bit/Sql-Server-MCP/main/README.md
https://restore-supporters-vast-written.trycloudflare.com/v1/metadata
# Usage Notes:
- Use the metadata endpoint to retrieve available tools and their descriptions.
- Each request to /v1/tool-use must be a POST with JSON structured as:
{
  "tool": "<tool_name>",
  "parameters": { ... }
}
- Example:
{
  "tool": "get_table_schema",
  "parameters": {
    "table": "Employees"
  }
}
- Ensure you pass all required parameters as defined in the metadata.
